tool.name: DumpMXDs

param.name: source
param.dialogReference: The source folder containing the MXD files.
param.pythonReference: A DEFolder specifying source folder containing the MXD files.

param.name: destination
param.dialogReference: The destination folder where output files will be saved.
param.pythonReference: A DEFolder specifying destination folder where output files will be saved.

param.name: outFormat
param.pythonReference: A GPString specifying output file format. Valid options include JPEG, PDF, and PNG.

tool.summary: Exports all MXD documents in a folder to the desired output file format and saves them in the an output folder.
tool.usage:
Use this tool to batch export multiple MXD documents. It is intended for use with map documents that have a single layout e.g. one document == one map. It is not intended to be used with data driven pages. If you need data driven pages support see the Export Data Driven Pages tool.

Caution: If your MXD contains bookmarks or has data driven pages enabled, this tool will only export the current page/extent of the document when it was last saved.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Exports all MXD documents in a folder to the desired output file format and saves them in the an output folder.
